content: I think I'll start by creating a social media post highlighting the non-profit section and the outreach committee's exhibit. I'll include a photo of the "Prayer Wall" idea and a brief description of the outreach committee's projects. I'll also use relevant hashtags to increase visibility. Do you think I should include a call-to-action, such as "Learn more about the outreach committee's projects and how you can get involved" or "Sign up to volunteer with the outreach committee at the flea market"?
